title: Google\Cloud\Monitoring\V3\AlertPolicy\AlertStrategy
name: AlertStrategy
description:
Control over how the notification channels in notification_channels are notified when this alert fires.

Generated from protobuf message google.monitoring.v3.AlertPolicy.AlertStrategy

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.notification_rate_limit
params.description: Required for alert policies with a LogMatch condition. This limit is not implemented for alert policies that are not log-based.

params.name: data.auto_close
params.description: If an alert policy that was active has no data for this long, any open incidents will close
